text: Charged $150 for translation when it was only $95 when done through the law firm. If it is $20-$30 more I can accept, but $55 is a huge difference. I even turned down a free courier service from them and spent more to take a taxi down for collection. I was accused of complaining after accepting the price. The fact is that I had done it before with them thru the law firm and I trusted them, so I did not think I needed to double confirm and compare with the previous charges. Disappointed with their reply.
Don't use them! Absolutely unprofessional and overpriced service. Making silly mistakes in translation of names, typos in document number and birth dates. Ignoring requests for refund.
